## R Markdown

This is a test table, in preparation for Paul's table.

```{r, echo = FALSE, context = "server"}

require(DT)
require(shiny)
require(tidyverse)

df <- read.csv("~/Box Sync/GitHub/airs_table/data.csv", header = TRUE) %>%
  select(-X.1, -X.2)

datatable(df)
```
